name: Super Bounce 2D
description:
Use platforms to avoid the hole...Get the highscore!

Avoid landing in the hole by drawing platforms and catching the ball. Break the blocks that spawn in to get points! 

Hitting the ball with a drawn platform will give 5 points. There are three block sizes, 10, 50 and 100 points. Breaking mulitple blocks before hitting the floor or a platform will earn a combo, use this to get a big score!

Other than just breaking blocks, you can earn points by building up and maintaining a highspeed!
Or you can juggle the ball avoiding hitting the walls, floor and blocks!

Controls:

Browser:
Click and Drag - Do this anywhere on the screen to draw platforms.
Click on the ball - Use this to catch this ball. Click again to throw it.

Android:Tap and Drag - Do this anywhere on the screen to draw platforms.
Tap on the ball - Use this to catch this ball. Tap again to throw it.
